items.name: install-chocolatey.ps1
items.title: Install Chocolatey
items.description: Installs Chocolatey package manager with proper configuration and health checks.

items.name: install-essential-apps.ps1
items.title: Install Essential Apps
items.description: Installs essential Windows applications including browsers, development tools, and utilities.

items.name: auto-update-chocolatey.ps1
items.title: Auto-Update Chocolatey
items.description: Automatically updates Chocolatey and packages when connected to specific WiFi and on power.

items.name: cleanup-chocolatey.ps1
items.title: Cleanup Chocolatey
items.description: Performs comprehensive cleanup of old package versions, cache, and orphaned dependencies.
